== dispatch_get_main_queue ==

centralManager = [[CBCentralManager alloc] initWithDelegate:self queue:dispatch_get_main_queue()];

- (CBCentralManager *)initWithDelegate:(id<CBCentralManagerDelegate>)delegate
queue:(dispatch_queue_t)queue

Description	

queue	
The dispatch queue on which the *events will be dispatched* . If nil, the *main queue* will be used by default.
